Articles.Content:
I could not find a suitable forum for this question. It does not go in "gameplay questions" because this has nothing to do with gameplay, and not in "space Lounge" cause it still has to do with KSP.

I'm wanting to render something on the Mun's surface in blender. I need to get a texture for the ground, and I was wondering if there is any way I can use the game's Mun texture for this. If not, any tips on how to get an acceptable Mun surface texture in blender?

I could not find a suitable forum for this question. It does not go in "gameplay questions" because this has nothing to do with gameplay, and not in "space Lounge" cause it still has to do with KSP.

I'm wanting to render something on the Mun's surface in blender. I need to get a texture for the ground, and I was wondering if there is any way I can use the game's Mun texture for this. If not, any tips on how to get an acceptable Mun surface texture in blender?

I'm not sure if it would be useful for use in blender, but here are planet textures that I updated with permission from Endraxial. It has a good moon texture. Hope this helps!
